changes: Add new icons: fearless, link, magic, movie, and shortcut.
Shadow classes and css-variables will now automatically swap to none in dark theme.
Now getting shadow class values from token package.
Fixed a bug where the spinbutton on a number input would still be visible when the input was disabled or readonly.
e-accordion is now marked as deprecated. Use the Elvia accordion component instead.

Add new icons: cables_connected, cables_connected-color, cables_connecting-color, cables_disconnected, cables_disconnected-color, community, decent, diversity, health_safety_environment, image-color, and open.
Add new icon: piggy_bank-color.
Added flex-wrap classes in utilities.
The spacing between elements in the File Upload component has been changed from 22px to 8px. This changes the total height of the component.
Removed styles for the :invalid CSS pseudo-class for e-input.
fixes: Adjust your design to accommodate for the new File Upload height.
Add the e-input---invalid class to your invalid e-input elements to get the styles for invalid inputs.

changes: Added :user-invalid CSS pseudo-class for e-input (Firefox only).
Fixed a bug where a step would get incorrect hover styles when disabled.
Fixed a bug where the step title would be misaligned with the step number.
Fixed a bug where the line connecting to a disabled step was displayed in the incorrect color.
Fixed a bug where if you put 'required' on an input field, it would automatically get the 'invalid' styles.
Stepper now uses Elvis typography styles.
The Position Picker component is now marked as deprecated.
Internal refactoring of Elvis styles with Stylelint.
Elvis now warns if if you use a class that is deprecated in its context, e.g. e-alert--close being used in an e-alert--local.
Fixed a bug where the placeholder text of disabled inputs was too dark.
Fixed a bug where the text inside a button wrapped onto a new line if too long.
Elvis now checks for deprecated classes a bit more efficiently.
Add new icons: note_approved, note_not_approved, note_not_approved-color
The hidden input in the checkbox component is now aligned with the visual checkbox
The hidden input in the radio button component is now aligned with the visual radio button
The hidden input in the toggle component is now aligned with the visual toggle
The search component now supports a loading state.
The search component now uses Elvis typography styles.
The magnifying glass icon is now vertically centered.
The disabled and invalid state now uses the correct colors and padding.
Removed the max width for the text in global alerts to better utilize screen space, as the alert itself does not have a max width.
The Toggle component can now have its label on either the left or right side of the switch.
The Toggle component is now available in two sizes: normal and compact.
There is no longer a constant 8px margin on the left side of the toggle component.
Fixed a bug where the Wrench icon would be cut off.
Fixed the readonly input e-input---readonly taking up too little space.
Bumped dependencies on internal packages @elvia/elvis-colors and @elvia/elvis-typography.
The Elvis class e-link--shortcut is now deprecated.
Add new icons: future, history, process-color, laws, laws-color, it_systems-color, notifications
Fixed a visual bug where the icon in a global alert would be misaligned if placed beside multiple lines of text.
The new Segmented Control component replaces the segmented control classes and these are now, therefore, deprecated.
Removed unnecessary files from the Elvis package, making it 7% smaller in size.
Added a loading state to the text field component.
Fixed compact text field border in Safari.
Fixed text field size in Safari.
Elvis now checks for deprecated classes more efficiently.
The header and tooltip classes have been replaced with a component and the classes will, therefore, be deprecated in the future.
Moved the label for compact inputs up to match the designs in Figma.
Padding was added over the compact inputs to prevent the label from overflowing.
fixes: The change impacts the total height of compact inputs. Ensure to adjust the spacing and/or alignment in your design to account for the larger size.

changes: Added support for readonly attribute for text input fields.
Elvis will now warn you in the developer console if your pages use deprecated Elvis classes and recommend a replacement.
Renamed the sizes for radio buttons from Medium and Small to Normal and Compact. The class e-radio--sm is renamed to e-radio--compact and will need to be updated in the future.
Renamed the sizes for checkboxes from Medium and Small to Normal and Compact. The class e-checkbox--sm is renamed to e-checkbox--compact and will need to be updated in the future.
Added a full width class to input fields, including text input and search
Added a new icon: new_tab.
All our typographies are now available through not only sm, md, lg etc. abbreviations, but also through the full size name; small, medium, large etc.
Updated from gulp-svgo til gulp-svgmin.
Fixes a bug that made svg not possible to open in Adobe programs.
Fixed a bug that caused the e-icon--color- classes to not properly work for filled icons.
Updated the size of the selected-marker for radio buttons.

Added several new icons: access_control, access_control-color, exit_full_screen, exit_full_screen-color, full_screen, full_screen-color, sorting_alfabetical_a_to_z, sorting_alfabetical_z_to_a, sorting_date_earliest_to_latest, sorting_date_latest_to_earliest, sorting_number_high_to_low, sorting_number_low_to_high, sorting_time_earliest_to_latest, sorting_time_latest_to_earliest, transformer, transformer-color, transformer_change, and transformer_change-color.
Fixed an icon that was not working, <code>cookie</codes>.
Fixed toggle disabled state so that the cursor becomes disabled.
Replaced old typography names with the new ones in elvis.
Updated all components with font color and text align to avoid inheriting the wrong style.
Added e-btn---selected classes that can be used when a button has a selected state.
Small table fix for the e-table--no-stripes class.
Added new thumbnail class.
Added multiple new flex classes and a couple border-radius classes
Added shadow classes.
Fixed a bug that was introduced in version 8.4.5 that broke group accordions.
Fixed a bug causing nested accordion icons to rotate along with the outermost accordion when opened.
Accordion group fix, removing flex from content container.
fixes: If you are using flex-direction: row inside the accordion group, this might break if you have not defined display: flex yourself.

changes: Now using elvis-colors for the colors in elvis.js.
Now using elvis-typography for typography definitions.
Changed name of class label to tag.
Added utility class for screen readers only content.
Fixed the toggle pseudo class e-toggle---focus.
Now using elvis-colors for color definitions.
Small patches to remove duplicated css.
Fixed color of error text in the form-classes.
Small bug fix for dividers in the header on mobile.
Fixed striped background sometimes breaking for tables using e-table__cell--multiline.
Fixed a bug where a table containing multiple e-table__cell--multiline cells would break.
Fixed two icons that were not working: play_circle-color and play_circle-filled-color.
Value in disabled compact text fields now gets correct color
Fixed bug where sidebar in the internal header was hidden by the url bar.
Fixed bug where native checkbox element was partly visible in Safari.
Fixed e-table--no-stripes not working properly.
Added multiple flex utility classes as well as some other classes like e-border-none, height classes, and e-strip-fieldset.
Table bug fix that aligns text in the table cells on mobile correctly.
Defined Red Hat Display as typography in links which were missing.
Table bug fix. Selected checkboxes in tables now have a selected indicator on desktops also.
Added classes for sticky headers on desktop and mobile, that should be used when tables have a lot of scrollable content.
Fixed a bug that caused toggle to not display correctly in Firefox browsers.
Added icons: thumbnail-color and adjust
Updated list of deprecated elvis classes.
Fixed focus outline on Toggle.
Updated icons package.
Small update inside local alert.
Migrated the deprecated divider symbol to math.div for Sass.
Updated Bootstrap to v4.6.1. Used in the grid classes.

Segmented controls are now in three sizes:
Small to Medium
Medium to Large
New Small size (smaller than the previous)
Title xs on mobiles has been updated font-size from 18px to 16px. This is done so that the difference between title sm and xs i more distinct.
Toggle has updated structure and now includes label and role. This is done for better accessibility.
fixes: Check where you are using segmented controls and update the sizes to the correct new size. If you have no specified size add e-segmented-controls--lg and if you have the small size specified (e-segmented-controls--sm) just remove the specification to receive medium size instead.
title-xs is smaller, make sure to use a bigger one if needed
Replace the old structure for all your toggles with the structure in the examples.

changes: Added primary colors(black, white and grey) as possible label colors.
Border radius utility classes are now available as e-br-4 and e-br-8.
Stepper hover state added.
Updated devDependencies.
Removed unused dependency.
Added import for Red Hat Text in font-weight 600 and updated link and list components to use this typography.
Added new modifier class for removing stripes in table body: e-table--no-stripes.
Using newest version of elvis-assets-icon package in elvis.
Added import for Red Hat Text in font-weight 700.
Added new typography class for comparing numbers in tables: e-text-mono.
Updated height for text-fields.
Deprecated e-card and e-link--card, replaced with card component.
Deprecated e-link--jumbo, replaced with action group pattern.
Updated several z-index values to be more consistent.
Increased header z-index.
Fixed small checkbox-mark misalignment.
Lists inside lists will get the correct elvis style.
New icon season and one updated icon.
Radio Button error state added.
Small version of Segmented Control added.
Documentation for using File Upload with more examples.
Text micro light typography added.
The Position Picker states 'normal' and 'picked' have been updated to be more user friendly and text color has been updated.
Search paddings updated so that close button is not in the way.
Bug fix for text Content Loader so that height can be set directly on content-loader element.
New icons added and electricity icons updated.
Now possible to disable hover on icons when hovering accordion title, by using the new modifier e-accordion__title--no-icon-hover.
Adjustment of z-index so it is now possible to use a Date Picker inside a modal content area.
Now possible to use a single accordion inside a group accordion content area.
Deprecated pseudo-class e-fileupload---hover, now using new modifier e-fileupload--dragover.
Update positioning of titles in cards with title above, now works together with Popover component.
Added five new icons.
Updated sorting icons, ascending is arrow up and descending is arrow down.
Deprecated Radio Button classes for invalid state, because a button should always be selected by default so the state is not necessary.
Content loader has new modifier for grey backgrounds.
Red signal color has been updated, #FF0000 to #EE0701, for better contrast and validation against both black and white.
The danger button hover color has been changed and documentation for more use cases has been updated. Disabled states have also been added to documentation.
Subtitles in tables on mobile have updated typography using the design system typographies.
Deprecated danger icon button, removed documentation, and fixed an hover bug for inverted icon button.
Group accordion have updated spacing between title and text.
New icons added.

Documentation for different actions in tables have been added, like inputs, buttons, selects and links. Sorting for tables is also updated, with new icons and functionality, but old functionality will not break.
Compact inputs without labels are now possible to use.
Updated labels with no-wrap, font-weight and font-family to avoid inheriting wrong style.
Update to icons(from 32px to 24px), and font-size(18px to 20px) for large accordions.
Tooltips now have left and right alignment classes
External links have been deprecated and replaced by New tab links. e-link--external will automatically work as e-link--new-tab instead.
External icons have also been deprecated in this context: arrow_external and arrow_external-bold now points to the new tab icon new_tab-bold.
Added documentation for nested checkboxes and added the new state indeterminate.
Normal sized checkboxes now has font-size 16px, instead of inheriting their font-size.

Using b and strong elements inside our text-classes (not title classes), will now give font-weight: 500, to make it easier to use bold versions of our typography in all types of applications. Example:
<p class="e-text-sm">
Text styled as text sm.
<b>This text will have e-text-sm style, but with font-weight 500 </b>
</p>
Content loader for dark backgrounds added: e-content-loader--inverted.
Typography now has Verdana as fallback font.

Documentation on links is updated and usage of different links made clearer. Breaking changes are; Forward links should be replaced by action links, back links should be replaced and now uses the --back modifier, and jumbo links uses a new icon.
Typography now has no specified text-align except those with text-align: center. All components now also include left-alignment inside the component itself.
Search classes must be replaced by the new classes, see documentation for examples.
fixes: Jumbo links can be fixed by just changing e-icon--arrow_right-bold to e-icon--arrow_long_right-bold.
For back and forward links read the documentation with examples to replace these.
e-search--local have been replaced by two new search variants; e-search--instant & e-search--on-submit.
The class e-search--global has also been removed and is no longer supported in Elvis.

changes: New modifier class added for cards that only contain text: e-card--text-only.
Compact class for table-footnote, e-table__footnote--compact, and smaller table-cell class, e-table__cell--multiline-small, added.
Icons have been updated, some have been deprecated and new icons have been added.
Divider component has been added.

Input with icons are now using icon buttons instead of just icons. Replace the icons with the button in the input doc. If you have been using the same structure in a date- or time-picker you may also need to replace this part with the button.
Strong and light versions of body text have been added, as well as on special text called 'micro'.
The search bar component has changed the default search icon. The size of the search and close icons has also been adjusted for both local and global search.
fixes: The changes only affect icon used to display a search bar. The only thing needed to fix this is to replace the e-icon--search-bold icon with the new e-icon--search-color

changes: New icon structure, enabling elvis to deprecate and rename old icons. Use of deprecated icons will also be warned in console with reference to in which version of Elvis the icon was deprecated, and what new icon should be used instead.
New icons from Figma has also been added to Elvis and search icons had been updated.
Added alignment to typography.
The e-btn--loading modifier for e-btn has been updated, and can now also be applied to an icon button

The header structure has changed so that the title is left aligned on desktop and tablet instead of center aligned.This requires that the top menu grid changes a little and that the title is added to the first column as well.
fixes:
The changes only affect the 'LOGO + APP' section. The fastest way to fix it if to search for the section called 'LOGO + APP' under the 'TOP MENU ~ DESKTOP'. Change the first div with the 'col' classes to this:
<div class="col-xs-2 col-sm-3 col-md-7 col-lg-8">

Then add these two lines at the bottom inside of the same div:
<span class="e-header__top-bar-desktop__line e-mx-32"></span>
<div class="e-header__top-bar-desktop__title">TITLE</div>
The other way is to replace the entire 'LOGO + APP' section with the examples showed in the documentation, and then add the information back where you lost it.

changes: The e-popover alignments classes for left and right positions have been renamed and refactored.
fixes: e-popover--top--left to e-popover--left
e-popover--bottom--left to e-popover--bottom e-popover--left
e-popover--top--right to e-popover--right
e-popover--bottom--right to e-popover--bottom e-popover--right

changes:
Classes for aligning 50% to the left or right from the middle.
  • e-popover--left-50
  • e-popover--right-50

Classes for sizing popover smaller when is has limited space.
  • e-popover--w-200
  • e-popover--w-220
  • e-popover--w-240
  • e-popover--w-260

The e-accordion__label has now been renamed to e-accordion__title. The e-accordion__label class is still available, but only in combination with the e-accordion--group modifier, and e-accordion__label is the container class for e-accordion__title and e-accordion__icon in a group accordion.
e-header is now added in front of all classes, following the BEM standard. Desktop top-bar classes now include the word 'desktop', like on mobile e.g. e-header__top-bar-desktop__link.
The design and structure of tables have been updated. Tables with black headers have been removed and a wrapper class has been added.
fixes:
The easiest way to fix an existing header is to search and replace the classes listed here with the new classes.
  • e-top-bar to e-header__top-bar
  • e-sidebar to e-header__sidebar
  • top-bar__ to top-bar-desktop__

Add an element with the e-table-container class outside the element with the e-table class.
  • e-table to e-table-container e-table

changes: A class for adding footnotes to the table has been created: e-table-footnote.

Some of the typography has new font-sizes and line-heights. The changes will affect the appearance of the typography where it is used and may need to be updated. Some components we offer have also changed typography which means some minor visual differences to these components.
A new smaller title has been added: e-title-xs.

All ---visible classes for Modal and Popover components are removed. New utility classes are added instead for showing and hiding elements. If you are using the Modal or Popover components you now have to use the new utility classes for hiding and showing. Theses components are by default now always visible.
fixes:
Add the e-none or e-invisble utility classes to toggle the components.
  • e-component---visible to e-none & e-invisible

changes: New utility classes have been added.

If you are using the grid-classes some might have to be updated to work as usual. The classes that have changed / been added:
  • e-grid-margin to e-grid-margin-ext + e-grid-margin-int
  • e-custom-gutters to e-grid-gutters-ext +e-grid-gutters-int + e-grid-gutters-vertical
New classes have been added for the internal-systems as well as classes for vertical gutters.
Renamed e-dragdrop---hover to .e-dragdrop--dragover.
Removed hover styles applied by the :hover pseudo-class. Use .e-dragdrop--dragover instead.

Switched from @import to @use. The @use rule is the primary replacement for @import, which will be deprecated in near future (2022 latest). @use is currently not supported by the node-sass compiler. Dart-sass is the primary implementation of Sass and do support the use of @use. Read more about the advantages of @use here:Sass module system
fixes: If you are using our stylesheets directly and your sass-compiler do not support the use of @use you will have to migrate as well.

changes: Switched from node-sass compiler to dart-sass compiler. Dart-sass is the primary implementation of Sass, which means it gets new features before any other implementation and at current time node-sass do not support the use of @use, which is the module system replacing @import. This might not affect you as a user.
Major renaming of icons. All icons now follow the correct and desired naming scheme for a maintainable library. Icon names have changed, so some references should be expected to now be broken
In this update icons are injected as background-images again on the 'i' tags with e-icon classes. We do not think this will have a large impact on how to use icons.
In this update we provided a solution for icons changing colors on hover. This affected buttons particularly. The structure of a button with icon was changed.
In this update outline was changes to work on IE11 and Firefox. The input field structure had to be updated because of the outline changes.
